# Electronic payment

# description

this page allow users to save credit cards data for future use

  • Electronic payment Page (opens new window)

# Saved Cards

  • the page will show saved card wite a mask to hide details

  • click add new card button to add new credit card

# add new card

  • add card data then click add new card , it will save the card and show all saved cards

  • or click BACK button to cancel adding card
